headline: Rent Spikes Stoke Dread By the Sea
abstract: Gentrification looms over the “freakishness and fun-loving spirit” of the boardwalk.
lead_paragraph: Dianna Carlin should be finishing the book she is writing about the joys of owning the Lola Star boutique, a “really tiny, magical little shop” on the Coney Island boardwalk, for the past 19 years.
